TopicTitle: Problems with Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail, reply here

Articles.Content:
Pre-ordered the day it was announced....still not got my confirmation e-mail yet =[

Had the one from PayPal though telling me that my payment went through

Same here.

I recived email from PayPal , but no preoder confirmation.
There! Got my confirmation, Thanks guys!
I pre-ordered on the 13th and haven't gotten a confirmation yet. The store does say my order was complete, though.
I preorded on the 21st, received my paypal confirmation but that is it. Maybe I'm not waiting long enough?

Thanks for working through all this pre-order confusion!

I donated on the 18th and have not received anything from KSP. It seems like we have to wait over a week before anything shows up, but I thought I'd let you guys know just in case.

I've pre-ordered on Aug 13th. No confirmation e-mail yet.

EDIT: Got it, thanks.
I didn't get one
Make sure you check the email address that your Paypal is linked to. In my case, my mother's.
Sent my donation last night. Got the paypal confirmation email, nothing else yet.

I got the 'you will receive an email confirming your pre-order in the next 72 hours' email but haven't recieved the pre-order confirmation email yet and i've checked my spam folder and added the email address to my contacts just in case.

I also received my paypal confirmation email, but no email after that (aug 15th).

-G

Adding to the 'I got the 'If you've contributed 7.00 USD or more, you will receive an email confirming your pre-order in the next 24 hours'' email and had no other emails.

Ordered on the 13/08/2011

I received this email on the 13th and have seen nothing since then - I donated enough to receive a pre-order. The link in the email says the order is complete.

It Is A Mystery ???

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for your donation!

You can view the download link and information at:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=store;sa=myorders

If you've contributed 7.00 USD or more, you will receive an email confirming your pre-order in the next 72 hours

Thanks for your support and happy launching!
I also pre-ordered on Aug 12 and got the paypal email, but I did not receive the follow-up confirmation email either. I've been checking all my email accounts and spam folders but still nothing yet.
I pre-ordered an the 13th August and still haven't received the email; I've checked spam folders and the like.

Same problem as everyone else. I got the notification saying thanks, and that i should get a pre-order in 24 hours. Also got a paypal note saying the order went through.

Not sure if thats all I'm supposed to get or if I'm missing a confirmation e-mail. I checked my spam and trash folders for it as well.
Edit: Recieved
Same here, haven't gotten the Pre-Order Confirmation E-mail.
Paid 3 days ago. Still nothing.
Paid August 23rd. I've got nothing but the Paypal receipt...

I'm adding my voice to the crowd.

Nothing yet, neither the 1st nor the 2nd email. :'(
Same here. Got the first email, but not the second one. Nothing in the spam-folder either.
Me too! Just got the paypal email but nothing else.
worked spot on for me, got the2nd mail 5-10 mins after 1st...
